metadata.title: Using the QSPI for SPI on RA MCUs

sections.content:
Question:
Can you use the QSPI for SPI on RA MCUs?
Answer:
The QSPI can be used in SPI mode to interface to serial peripherals (such as ADCs, DACs, LCD controllers, CAN controllers and sensors), or in Serial Memory mode to interface to serial Flash memories.
The QSPI allows the system to execute code directly from a serial Flash memory (XIP) without code shadowing to RAM.
Suitable Products
RA
